Multicomponent Thermodynamic And Transport Properties for Ionized gases in C++
wrapper_test.f90

28 program main
29  use mutationpp
30  implicit none
31  character(len=10) :: mixture, state_model
32  character(len=12) :: species
33  integer :: i, j, ne, ns, nr, var
34 
35  real(8) :: t, p, rho, n, cp, cv, h, mw, e
36  real(8), dimension(:), allocatable :: species_x, wdot, species_y
37  real(8), dimension(:), allocatable :: mwi
38 
39  mixture = "air_11"
40  state_model = "Equil"
41  var = 1
42 
43  call mpp_initialize(mixture, state_model)
44  ne = mpp_nelements()
45  ns = mpp_nspecies()
46  nr = mpp_nreactions()
47 
48  write(*,*) "ne: ", ne, "ns: ", ns, "nr: ", nr
49 
50  allocate(species_x(ns))
51  allocate(species_y(ns))
52  allocate(wdot(ns))
53  allocate(mwi(ns))
54 
55  p = 101325.0
56  call mpp_species_mw(mwi)
57 
58  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "T(K) "
59  do j = 1,ns
60  call mpp_species_name(j, species)
61  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "X_"//species
62  end do
63  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "P(Pa) "
64  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "rho(kg/m^3) "
65  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "n(1/m^3) "
66  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "Mw(kg/mol) "
67  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "Cp(J/kg-K) "
68  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "Cv(J/kg-K) "
69  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "h(J/kg) "
70  write(*,'(A12)',advance='no') "e(J/kg) "
71  write(*,*)
72 
73  ! Loop over temperature and compute equilibrium properties
74  do i = 1,295
75  t = dble(i-1)*50.0 + 300.0
76 
77  call mpp_set_state(t, p, var)
78  call mpp_x(species_x)
79 
80  write(*,'(E12.4)',advance='no') t
81  do j = 1,ns
82  write(*,'(E12.4)',advance='no') species_x(j)
83  end do
84 
85  n = mpp_number_density()
86  rho = mpp_density()
87  mw = mpp_mixture_mw()
88  cp = mpp_mixture_frozen_cp_mass()
89  cv = mpp_mixture_frozen_cv_mass()
90  h = mpp_mixture_h_mass()
91  e = mpp_mixture_e_mass()
92 
93  write(*,'(8E12.4)') p, rho, n, mw, cp, cv, h, e
94  end do
95 
96  ! Clean up the memory stored in the mutation++ library
97  call mpp_destroy()
98 
99 end program main
main
int main(int argc, char **argv)
Main entry point into the program.
